product_details.description: OPTIMUM NUTRITION'S GOLD STANDARD 100% Whey uses pure Whey Protein Isolates as the primary ingredient. Combined with ultra-filtered whey protein concentrate, each serving provides 24 grams of all-whey protein and 5.5 grams of naturally occurring Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs) which are prized by athletes for their muscle building qualities. With more than 20 tempting flavors to choose from, ON GOLD STANDARD 100% Whey gives you plenty of ways to keep workout recovery interesting. Search "ON Apparel TRUE STRENGTH" to see our new ON clothing line! Gold Standard 100% Whey Protein: 24 grams of blended protein consisting of whey protein isolate, whey protein concentrate, and whey peptides to support lean muscle mass - they don't call it the Gold Standard of quality for nothing 5.5 grams of naturally occurring branched chain amino acids (BCAAs) and 11 grams of naturally occurring essential amino acids (EAAs) per serving to support muscle recovery Anytime formula: great before or after exercise, between meals, with a meal, or any time of day when you need extra protein Banned substance tested and the highest quality control measures so you feel comfortable and confident consuming the product Optimum Nutrition is the World's #1 Sports Nutrition Brand* *Source Euromonitor International Limited; Consumer Health 2023 Edition, Sports Nutrition category, % retail value shares, 2022 data Brand - Optimum Nutrition ** Flavor - Extreme Milk Chocolate ** Servings per Container - 71 ** Item Weight - 5 Pounds ** Material Type Free - Gluten Free **

banner_details:
The banner showcases a bold and dynamic design promoting a fitness supplement. At the top, a prominent heading labeled by the id "heading" is styled in a large, golden font, drawing immediate attention. Directly below it, the subheading with id "subheading" emphasizes the core product benefit in crisp white text. Central to the design is a product image labeled "product_image", set within a dark circular accent bordered in gold. A red circular element highlights the "price" text layer, placed neatly within its bounds. At the bottom, key benefits are conveyed in the "description" text layer using bullet points followed by a bright red call-to-action button labeled via "cta" encouraging immediate purchase. The black background is decorated with gold geometric and dotted elements with subtle overlays giving it a modern and high-impact look.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black (#121212)
- Gold (#D4AF37)
- Bright Red (#D12027)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Charcoal Gray (#2A2A2A)
product_color: The product image features a bold and premium color palette that conveys strength and reliability. Dominated by **matte black (#1C1C1C)**, the background gives a strong, sleek base that enhances visual contrast. **Gold (#C49A5A)** is used for accents like "Gold Standard", symbolizing premium quality. **Creamy beige (#F2E7C9)** is used for the main text, making it stand out against the black. **Bright red (#D8252F)** commands attention, used in the callouts like "71 Servings" and flavor label, ideal for highlighting key details. These colors are well-blended with a gradient effect and diagonal patterns to retain texture, yet each element remains crisply defined.
